# Header1

# Example dataset

## example of downloading the dataset

```{r downloaddata, echo=FALSE, code_folding = FALSE}
library(downloadthis)
  download_file(
    path='data/Attendance list.xlsx',
    output_name = "Attendance list.xlsx",
    button_label = "Download Attendance data",
    button_type = "warning",
    has_icon = TRUE,
    icon = "fa fa-save"
  )
```

<br>
